original_title: Pan Asia Bank rewards loved ones of its remittance customers
original_body_lines: As a way of rewarding its remittance customer base for their loyalty, Pan Asia Bank has launched a new promotion wherein the Top 5 customers who made highest remittances will win a sum of Rs. 50,000 every month. In order to be eligible for the new programme, customers must remit their funds through one of the Bank’s remittance partners – Ria, Western Union or Small World – as over-the-counter cash pickups. This will continue until 31st December 2023.

Remittances from migrant workers have been supporting the country’s economic growth for decades. As one of the trusted banks for Sri Lankans overseas, Pan Asia Bank’s remittance service offers them a seamless experience in sending money to their loved ones in Sri Lanka.

Pan Asia Bank’s Chief Manager – Deposit Mobilization Buddhika Perera said, “We believe this promotion is very timely. Overseas customers can remit large amounts as over-the-counter cash pickups for their loved ones to collect. In turn, we will reward their loved ones. Our base of remittance customers and value of remittances has been growing steadily which reflects the faith placed in the Bank.”

Pan Asia Bank continues to add value to the customer experience through such customer-centric programmes while adding convenience and bringing in precious foreign currency. As the nation’s Truly Sri Lankan Bank, Pan Asia Bank is closely engaged with its customers and strives to understand their needs and aspirations.
